basics.name: Stephen L Boettcher
basics.label: Solutions Engineer (Software / Developer Transition)
res_summary: Technical professional with 10+ years of software development experience, transitioning into Solutions Engineering. Skilled at translating complex software systems into actionable business solutions and guiding clients through evaluation, implementation, and optimization of web-based and SaaS platforms.

Proven ability to partner with stakeholders, lead Agile teams, deliver technical demos, and ensure customer success, leveraging hands-on experience with front-end and full-stack technologies including Svelte, React, Next.js, TypeScript, and PHP.

Experienced in bridging business requirements and technical execution, capturing detailed specifications, managing projects, and providing workflow recommendations that improve adoption, operational efficiency, and measurable impact for clients.
home_summary: Welcome! This portfolio highlights my journey from a developer and technical project manager to a Solutions Engineer. I specialize in helping organizations understand, evaluate, and implement software solutions while ensuring technical and business alignment.

I have hands-on experience with web and enterprise software, including Svelte, React, Next.js, Astro, and back-end integrations, combined with a proven track record in stakeholder collaboration and agile delivery.
